item.title: [Codewars] Mumbling
item.author: ykhorizon@gmail.com (ykhorizon)
item.description: 問題範例 Accumul.Accum("abcd"); // "A-Bb-Ccc-Dddd" Accumul.Accum("RqaEzty"); // "R-Qq-Aaa-Eeee-Zzzzz-Tttttt-Yyyyyyy" Accumul.Accum("cwAt"); // "C-Ww-Aaa-Tttt" 我的寫法 using System; public class Accumul { public static String Accum(string s) { string sOut = ""; for(int i=0;i<s.Length;i++){ char c = s[i]; if(char.IsLower(s[i]) == true){ c = char.ToUpper(s[i]); } sOut += c; for(int j=0;j<i;j++){ sOut += char.ToLower(s[i]); } if(i!=s.Length-1){ sOut += "-"; } } return sOut; } } 他人解法賞析 using System; using System.Linq; public class Accumul { public static String Accum(string s) { return string.
